{{cpp/io/basic_filebuf/title|swap}}
{{cpp/io/basic_filebuf/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
void swap( std::basic_filebuf&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Swaps the state and the contents of {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|another {{tt|basic_filebuf}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Notes===
This function is called automatically when swapping {{lc|std::fstream}} objects, it is rarely necessary to call it directly.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;fstream&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::ifstream fin("test.in"); // read-only
    std::ofstream fout("test.out"); // write-only

    std::string s;
    getline(fin, s);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s &lt;&lt; '\n'; // outputs the first line of test.in

    fin.rdbuf()-&gt;swap(*fout.rdbuf()); //swap the underlying buffers

    getline(fin, s); // fails: cannot read from a write-only filebuf
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s &lt;&lt; '\n'; // prints empty line
}
}}
